To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-01-20 17:01
Subject: Calling All Managers, Welcoming Huda Al Ahli, Voice of the People Survey, EV Experience with EVLAB & Sports Day with People of Determination Athletes
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/28080c3935a092bb1669180f3612abcc1861509350.png> 	
Calling All Managers! 

Friendly reminder that the Line Managers Assessments phase of the Performance Cycle is underway and the deadline for completing these is Friday 31st January.

For any questions, please reach out to a member of the Performance Management team. 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-2-min.png> 	

WELCOMING HUDA AL AHLI TO THE GROUP

chunks.text:
For any questions, please reach out to a member of the Performance Management team. 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-2-min.png> 	

WELCOMING HUDA AL AHLI TO THE GROUP

Huda Al Ahli joins the Talent Management team as Director – Talent Management, National Development. In this key role, Huda will lead our National Development strategy, focusing on designing impactful programmes that accelerate leadership capabilities and build sustainable pipelines of national talent across the Group. Read more <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fonechalhoub.connexionsnow.com%2Fmtracking%2Flinkref.php%3Flink1id%3D91%26user%3D10620&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Cd05b327e3ca548e2b7c208dd3952819a%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638729748703591556%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=fMq9BzfVeZvxs0YE%2FqzqL0E2LvdJU7o8pRunDlyyZX0%3D&reserved=0>

As we step into a new year, it's time to reflect on your workplace experience and share your insights by participating in the Voice of the People Survey.

Your honest feedback will help us celebrate what we’re doing well and identify areas where we can grow and improve together.

The survey is voluntary, confidential, and will only take about 10 minutes to complete. All responses will be reported collectively, ensuring your privacy.

chunks.text:
Your honest feedback will help us celebrate what we’re doing well and identify areas where we can grow and improve together.

The survey is voluntary, confidential, and will only take about 10 minutes to complete. All responses will be reported collectively, ensuring your privacy.

If you have any questions, please feel free to reach out to your people partner or contact us at People.Experience@chalhoub.com.

Take the survey! <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fonechalhoub.connexionsnow.com%2Fmtracking%2Flinkref.php%3Flink1id%3D92%26user%3D10620&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Cd05b327e3ca548e2b7c208dd3952819a%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638729748703681340%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=MEzUYhybbFGuz61BZll0EJaGoU5vG2YimO%2FY0Azt2pg%3D&reserved=0> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-1-min.png> 	

JOIN US FOR AN EV EXPERIENCE WITH EVLAB

Test drive top of the line EV's and feel the future of driving!

- Wednesday, 22nd January
- 10am - 2pm
- EVLAB Electric Mobility Experience Center The Offices 1, One Central, DWTC, Dubai
